channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Israel has recovered the final hostage remains from Gaza
item.description: The Israeli military says the body of Ran Gvili, a 24-year-old special forces policeman killed while fighting Hamas militants on Oct. 7, 2023, has bee...

item.title: Ukrainians are sharing hacks online on how to survive winter power cuts
item.description: After repeated Russian attacks on Ukraine's energy grid, Ukrainians face long outages during a cold winter at war. On social media, Ukrainians share t...

item.title: Minnesota officials rebuff DOJ's data demands after latest shooting by federal agents
item.description: Minnesota officials are rebuffing demands from U.S. Attorney General Pam Bondi, as the state continues its clash with the Trump administration over th...

item.title: Hundreds of thousands without power in the U.S. after a powerful winter storm
item.description: A powerful winter storm walloped a huge swath of the U.S., killing at least 18 people. Electricity is out for hundreds of thousands, and freezing rain...

item.title: Treasury cancels Booz Allen contracts over leaks about wealthy taxpayers
item.description: A Booz Allen contractor had leaked confidential tax information that showed how wealthy people like Donald Trump, Elon Musk and Jeff Bezos manage to m...

item.title: In their words: An examination of statements Trump officials made about what led to Pretti’s death
Trump abandons attack mode as Minneapolis shooting backlash grows
item.description: The White House has shifted how it talks about Alex Pretti's killing as more Republicans express concern over the deadly encounter.

item.title: New Iran videos show bodies piled in hospital and snipers on roofs
item.description: Footage from a hospital in Tehran shows at least 31 bodies piled inside and seven body bags outside.

item.title: Some Border Patrol agents in Alex Pretti shooting had body cams, officials confirm
item.description: U.S. Border Patrol commander Gregory Bovino and some of his agents are expected to soon leave the Minneapolis area, two sources familiar with the move...

item.title: Israel says it has retrieved remains of final Gaza hostage
item.description: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu called Ran Gvili’s return "an extraordinary achievement".

item.title: Trump sends border czar to Minnesota and says he and governor are now on a ‘similar wavelength’
item.description: A federal judge is considering Minnesota’s challenge to the Trump administration’s immigration crackdown.

item.title: Walz: Trump agrees to consider reducing federal surge in Minnesota
item.description: Gov. Tim Walz says that he and President Trump shared a "productive" phone call Monday morning, during which he says the president agreed to consider ...

item.title: Private jet carrying eight people crashes in Maine
item.description: Poor visibility was reported at the airport during a winter storm that has affected a large swathe of the US.

item.title: Nigerian officers to face trial over coup-plot allegations
item.description: Following an investigation some of the 16 detained last year are accused of planning to unseat President Bola Tinubu.

item.title: Thousands still without power in southern U.S., airlines trying to recover amid winter storm
item.description: A thick coating of ice brought down trees and electrical lines in the southern U.S., knocking out power for hundreds of thousands. Meanwhile, the wint...

item.title: Snow still falling in New England as deadly winter storm finishes trek through U.S.
item.description: Lingering snow from this weekend's massive winter storm is still falling in parts of New England Monday. At least 12 deaths have been attributed to th...

item.title: Inside the court hearings over ICE in Minnesota, evidence in Alex Pretti killing
item.description: Minnesota state and local officials are trying to argue in court that the federal deployment of immigration agents in Minneapolis is illegal. Two sepa...

item.title: Businesses face pressure to respond to immigration enforcement while also becoming a target of it
